title: Cecily Aguilar sentenced to 30 years in Vanessa Guillen case
description: Cecily Aguilar, who pleaded guilty to one count of accessory to murder after the fact and three other charges in the 2020 murder of Vanessa Guillén, has been sentenced.

title: Biden administration begins canceling student loan debt for 804,000 borrowers
description: The Biden administration is canceling student loan debt for 804,000 borrowers who qualify under income-driven repayment plans but haven't received it because of errors

title: Northwestern sued again over troubled athletics program
description: Three former Northwestern baseball staffers filed a lawsuit against the university alleging their contracts were discontinued as retaliation for reporting misconduct in the program

title: Lahaina resident says 'nothing left but ashes' as community rallies around each other
description: Much of the historic town of Lahaina has been "destroyed," officials said, and the inferno has burned thousands of residential and commercial buildings to the ground.

title: WATCH:  Woman walks across Trevi Fountain to fill water bottle
description: A woman stunned onlookers as she walked across the Trevi Fountain and used one of Rome’s most iconic tourist attractions to fill up her water bottle.

title: Philadelphia teen arrested, charged in FBI terrorism investigation
description: A Philadelphia teen has been charged and arrested with multiple state charges stemming from an FBI terrorism investigation, officials announced Monday.

title: Maui wildfire now ranks as the fifth-deadliest in US history
description: The fire causing widespread devastation across the Hawaiian island of Maui is now the fifth deadliest wildland blaze in U.S. history.

title: Clarence Avant, trailblazing Black record executive, dies at 92
description: Clarence Avant, the trailblazing record executive known as 'The Black Godfather,' has died at age 92.

title: Judge sides with young activists in first-of-its-kind climate change trial in Montana
description: A Montana judge has sided with young environmental activists who said state agencies were violating their constitutional right to a clean and healthful environment by permitting fossil fuel development without considering its effect on the climate

title: Biden: Auto workers need "jobs that can support family" in union talks with carmakers
description: President Joe Biden is asking the major U.S. automakers and their workers’ union to reach an agreement that takes “every possible step to avoid painful plant closings” as the sector transitions to electric vehicles

title: Fulton County prepares for possible Trump indictment as some question impact
description: In political settings, people gave strong opinions about another Trump indictment, this time in Fulton County, Georgia, whereas others were less aware of the case.

title: 3 found dead in car in Indianapolis school parking lot
description: Police in Indianapolis are investigating after three people were found dead in a car parked outside an elementary school

title: 6 former Mississippi officers plead guilty to charges for torturing 2 Black men
description: Six white former Mississippi law officers who tortured two Black men have pleaded guilty to state-level charges

title: Trump assails judge in 2020 election case
description: Donald Trump is attacking the federal judge overseeing the election conspiracy case against him days after she warned him not to make inflammatory statements about the case

title: 12-year-old speaks out after ‘traumatic’ wrongful detention by Lansing police
description: A 12-year-old who was wrongfully handcuffed and detained by police in Lansing, Michigan speaks out in an interview with “Good Morning America."

title: Clarence Avant, ‘Godfather of Black Music,' dies at 92
description: Clarence Avant, the manager, entrepreneur, facilitator and adviser who helped launch or guide the careers of Quincy Jones, Bill Withers and many others and came to be known as “The Godfather of Black Music,” has died

title: Russia's currency hits the lowest level since beginning of the war in Ukraine
description: The Russian ruble has reached its lowest value since the early weeks of the war in Ukraine as Moscow increases military spending and Western sanctions weigh on its energy exports

title: Coast Guard searches for 4 missing divers off the Carolinas
description: The U.S. Coast Guard says it is searching for four divers who disappeared off the Carolina coast

title: Karen Pence 'never felt afraid' on Jan. 6: ABC News exclusive
description: Former Second Lady Karen Pence discusses the Capitol attack on Jan. 6, 2021, in a rare interview with ABC News Live Prime Anchor Linsey Davis airing on Monday.

title: Heavy rains trigger floods and landslides in India, at least 16 dead
description: Indian officials say heavy monsoon rains have triggered floods and landslides in the country's Himalayan region, leaving at least 22 people dead and many others trapped

title: Crews search for possible missing after a mudslide in the Italian Alps coats streets
description: Rescue crews in an Italian Alpine city are searching for any possible missing people along the path of a mountain stream that violently burst its banks, causing a mudslide

title: Chinese minister to visit Russia, Belarus in show of support despite West's objection
description: Chinese Defense Minister Li Shangfu is visiting Russia and Belarus in a show of support for those nations which the West has sought to isolate over the Russian invasion of Ukraine

title: Police report 'emergency incident' after airliner returns to Sydney Airport
description: Officials and media say a commercial airline flight from Australia to Malaysia has returned to Sydney after an emergency incident

title: Several suffer serious injuries in 'mass casualty' boating incident at Lake Austin
description: One person was airlifted to a hospital and another taken by ambulance with serious injuries after a boat ran aground at Lake Austin in Texas, Sunday, authorities said.

title: WATCH:  Fighter jet crashes during Michigan air show
description: A fighter jet crashed into a parking lot during an air show in Michigan, with crew members ejecting before the aircraft went down. No serious injuries have been reported.

title: North Korea orders increase in missile production, days before US-South Korea drills
description: North Korean state media say leader Kim Jong Un has made another inspection tour of munitions factories and ordered a drastic increase in production of missiles and other weapons
